about_me.des: I am a Full Stack engineer with website development, automation Ops and writing scripts experience. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel.

projects.aspen: AspenCX is a post purchase customer management system that enhances retailers' ability to service customers across multiple channels.
projects.view: Acadview Is a EdTech company, I worked as a full-stack developer and done data analytics for the product whose features were mostly ops-driven.
projects.sass_com: Software as a service products which e-commerce websites can intergerate to improve the shopping experience.
projects.buyer_persona: Digital marketing tool helps to find out the buyer's persona by plotting its interest and based on hash_tags, location, comments etc on Instagram.
projects.word-beater: Simple JS game that increments your score if you type the right word as displayed else game over.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
